snippet.title: Broken Spectre - Official Gameplay Trailer | Upload VR Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
From a producer of The Blair Witch Project, comes a brand new VR cosmic horror story. Inspired by the likes of H.P. Lovecraft, and John Carpenter, Broken Spectre will have you looking for your missing father, as you explore a lowly mountain, all while being stalked by a terrifying power.

Broken Spectre is coming to the Meta Quest VR headset and will be available on June 21st.

#GameTrailers #VR #SummerofGaming
